eventDecorators.name: MaxFreeWithdrawChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: MaxWhitelistWithdrawChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: WhitelistChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setMaxFreeWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Sets `amount` as maxFreeWithdraw bound. Can only be called by the contract owner. Emits an {MaxFreeWithdrawChanged} event.

functionDecorators.name: setMaxWhitelistWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Sets `amount` as maxWhitelistWithdraw bound. Can only be called by the contract owner. Emits an {MaxWhitelistWithdrawChanged} event.

functionDecorators.name: setWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Sets `account` as whitelisted or not. Can only be called by the contract owner. Emits an {WhitelistChanged} event.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Tries to withdraw specified `amount` of Ether.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAll
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws contract's entire balance. Can only be called by the contract owner.
